titles.title: Tobacco Tax Equity Act of 2023
Tobacco Tax Equity Act of 2023
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax rate parity among all tobacco products, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Tobacco Tax Equity Act of 2023
This bill increases the excise tax on cigarettes and cigars and equalizes tax rates among all other tobacco products. It also imposes a tax on nicotine for use in vaping.
